title: FS: Ungraded cards, some trimmed. Cheap! HOF, commons (CLOSED)

posts.post_title: FS: Ungraded cards, some trimmed. Cheap! HOF, commons (CLOSED)
posts.post_content:
Have to clear out some cards. Help me out! Lots of cards available on the cheap.

Payment via PP friends/family or money order (I will hold until payment). Please add $2 for shipping regardless of how many you want.

Willing to listen to offers, especially if buying multiple cards. Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets Priority over ongoing negotiations.

I also have a number of trimmed commons currently available on eBay. Can definitely work a deal with those....20% off all ungraded and save a few bucks on shipping.  I still have a bunch of other trimmed cards including HOFers and a Lundgren Cubs so PM me if you are looking for specifics.

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/thromdog/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_ipg=&_from=[/url]

$SOLD Stark SL
$SOLD Jordan SL Old Mill oversized. 
$SOLD Orth SL oversized
$SOLD Paige SL oversized
$SOLD Helm SL oversized
